chunk:
Grown Alchemist Hydra-Repair Eye Balm (2019 formulation)

Brand: Grown Alchemist

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia Tea) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Petroselinum Crispum (Parsley) Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Plan

il, Tocopherol (Plant), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Calendula Officinalis (Marigold) Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Oil, Linalool (Plant), Limonene (Plant).

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Use Restrictions
